desc: Create perfect wood-fired pizzas with a Outi pizza oven. Light weight, easy to use and made from stainless steel the Outi portable wood-fired pizza oven will bring the authentic Italian restaurant experience to the comfort of your own home and garden.

layout.text: NO.1 PIZZA OVEN BASED ON REAL REVIEWS

WAS £229

INCLUDES FREE DELIVERY,
PIZZA PADDLE AND CARRYCOVER!
